english_translation: In the sweetness of the flute's call, waves of new feelings,
The pleasant sweetness of the raga, where there is no anxiety at all.

kannada_original: ಆಸೆ ನಂದದ ನಭದಿ ಅದುವೆ ಬೆಳ್ಳಿಯ ಚುಕ್ಕೆ
english_transliteration: Āse nandada nabadi aduve beḷḷiya cukke
english_translation: In the never-extinguishing sky of desire, that is the silver star (dot).
That is the light within the mind – Muddu Rāma.
